requirements.raw_text: The proposed POS solution must minimally meet the capabilities of critical functions and features that exist in the existing POS frontend and backend solution.
requirements.normalized_text: POS must meet or exceed existing frontend and backend functional capabilities

constraint.description: Match or exceed existing frontend and backend capabilities

requirements.raw_text: The POS solution must support Cashier and Self-Checkout POS UI customized to tenant requirements including boarding pass scanning.
requirements.normalized_text: Support customized Cashier and Self-Checkout POS UI including boarding pass scanning

requirements.raw_text: The system should support offline mode and synchronize transactions when connectivity resumes.
requirements.normalized_text: Operate POS in offline mode with deferred synchronization

constraint.description: Support offline operation with automatic sync on connectivity restoration

requirements.raw_text: The POS must support duty-free liquor allowance checks and GST toggling for traveler and non-traveler transactions.
requirements.normalized_text: Support duty-free allowance checks and GST toggling based on traveler status

constraint.description: Apply rules for duty-free allowances and GST based on passenger eligibility

requirements.raw_text: The system shall integrate with Changi Rewards loyalty system for points earning and voucher redemption.
requirements.normalized_text: Integrate POS with Changi Rewards for loyalty earning and redemption

constraint.description: Integrate with loyalty platform for accrual and redemption

requirements.raw_text: The POS solution shall integrate with CAG appointed digital payment providers such as ChangiPay.
requirements.normalized_text: Integrate POS with CAG-appointed digital payment providers

constraint.description: Support integration with appointed payment providers

requirements.raw_text: The POS must support configurable restrictions on sale of age-restricted and regulated products.
requirements.normalized_text: Support configurable regulatory restrictions on product sales

constraint.description: Enforce configurable sales restrictions based on regulation and age

requirements.raw_text: The system shall automatically apply promotions and campaigns configured by tenants or CAG.
requirements.normalized_text: Automatically apply tenant and CAG promotions and campaigns

constraint.description: Automatically apply configured promotions and campaigns

requirements.raw_text: The POS frontend shall allow sales and refund transactions to be completed quickly to support retail operations.
requirements.normalized_text: Enable fast completion of sales and refund transactions

constraint.description: Support quick completion of sales and refunds for retail operations

requirements.raw_text: The system shall log and audit all POS user activities including sales, refunds, voids, and logins.
requirements.normalized_text: Audit all POS user activities

constraint.description: Log and audit all user activities for traceability

requirements.raw_text: The POS must not store full cardholder data (PAN, CVV, track data) locally or in logs.
requirements.normalized_text: Prevent local storage or logging of full cardholder data

constraint.description: Disallow local persistence or logging of sensitive payment data; tokenize or mask as required

requirements.raw_text: Self-checkout terminals shall not process sales of age-restricted products without verified age.
requirements.normalized_text: Disallow self-checkout sales of age-restricted products unless age is verified

constraint.description: Restrict purchase flow until age verification is successful

requirements.raw_text: The POS must not allow refunds above configured thresholds without supervisor approval.
requirements.normalized_text: Restrict refunds exceeding threshold unless supervisor approves

constraint.description: Gate high-value refunds via approval workflow

requirements.raw_text: The POS should not operate in offline mode for high-risk tender types (e.g., cross-border wallets) without explicit fallback rules.
requirements.normalized_text: Prevent offline transactions for high-risk tenders unless fallback rules are configured

constraint.description: Disallow offline acceptance for specified high-risk tenders without safeguards

requirements.raw_text: The system must not expose administrative functions (voids, price overrides, user management) on customer-facing UI.
requirements.normalized_text: Disallow administrative functions on customer-facing interfaces

constraint.description: Restrict admin-only controls to privileged interfaces

requirements.raw_text: Provide customizable POS UIs for cashier and self-checkout, including boarding pass scanning, aligned to tenant branding.
requirements.normalized_text: Customizable cashier and self-checkout UIs with boarding pass scan

constraint.description: Customization per tenant including boarding pass capture

requirements.raw_text: When offline, queue transactions locally with retry and conflict resolution and sync automatically on reconnection.
requirements.normalized_text: Offline queuing with automatic retry and conflict resolution

constraint.description: Ensure graceful offline behavior with reliable sync

requirements.raw_text: Maintain immutable, tamper-evident audit trails for all POS activities with cryptographic hashing.
requirements.normalized_text: Immutable audit logs with tamper evidence

constraint.description: Audit logs must be tamper-evident and immutable

requirements.raw_text: Mask cardholder data in all logs and screens (showing only last 4 digits of PAN); never store CVV or track data.
requirements.normalized_text: Mask PAN and exclude CVV/track data from storage and logs

constraint.description: Enforce strict masking and tokenization policies

requirements.raw_text: Require multi-level approval workflows for high-value refunds and voids with configurable thresholds.
requirements.normalized_text: Multi-level approval for high-value refunds/voids

constraint.description: Gate high-risk actions via tiered approvals

requirements.raw_text: Support coupon/voucher scanning, stacking rules, and priority resolution for overlapping promotions.
requirements.normalized_text: Coupon/voucher scanning with stacking and priority rules

constraint.description: Promotion application must support stacking and precedence

requirements.raw_text: Validate boarding pass details via airline/DCS or CAG services to confirm traveler eligibility for duty-free.
requirements.normalized_text: Boarding pass validation via airline/DCS/CAG services

requirements.raw_text: Integrate age verification (ID scan, passport/MRZ, or attendant approval) for regulated product sales.
requirements.normalized_text: Age verification integration for regulated sales

constraint.description: Require verified age before completion of sale

requirements.raw_text: Reserve inventory during checkout to avoid overselling, releasing on cancellation or timeout.
requirements.normalized_text: Inventory reservation during checkout

constraint.description: Prevent oversell while maintaining availability accuracy

requirements.raw_text: Provide cash management (drawer control, blind counts, end-of-day reconciliation, variance reporting).
requirements.normalized_text: Cash management and reconciliation

constraint.description: Ensure accurate cash handling and auditability

requirements.raw_text: Offer digital receipts (email/SMS/QR) with consent capture and redaction of sensitive fields.
requirements.normalized_text: Digital receipts with consent and redaction

constraint.description: Respect data minimization and consent requirements

requirements.raw_text: Provide multilingual and accessible UIs (WCAG 2.1 AA), including high-contrast and large-touch targets.
requirements.normalized_text: Multilingual and accessible POS UIs (WCAG 2.1 AA)

requirements.raw_text: Support peripherals for travel retail (2D barcode scanners, MRZ readers, passport OCR, boarding pass readers).
requirements.normalized_text: Peripheral support: 2D scanners, MRZ readers, passport OCR

constraint.description: Ensure compatibility with travel retail peripherals

requirements.raw_text: Apply Singapore tax rules including GST exemptions/zero-rating for eligible duty-free/exports and traveler status.
requirements.normalized_text: Singapore GST handling including duty-free/exports

constraint.description: Correct tax determination per SG rules

requirements.raw_text: Define tender-specific fallback policies (e.g., EMV offline, deferred capture) with risk parameters and blocklists.
requirements.normalized_text: Tender fallback policies with risk controls

constraint.description: Allow fallback only under controlled, configured policies

requirements.raw_text: Each POS UI action should respond within 300 ms on average; complete a typical sale in under 3 seconds.
requirements.normalized_text: UI response and sale completion performance targets

requirements.raw_text: Core POS services should achieve 99.9% monthly availability excluding planned maintenance.
requirements.normalized_text: 99.9% availability target for core POS services

requirements.raw_text: Enforce role-based access control (RBAC) and least-privilege for all POS functions and APIs.
requirements.normalized_text: RBAC with least-privilege for POS functions/APIs

constraint.description: Restrict functions based on roles and permissions

requirements.raw_text: Comply with PDPA (Singapore) for personal data; configurable retention and automated purge of PII.
requirements.normalized_text: PDPA compliance with configurable data retention

constraint.description: Protect personal data and minimize retention

requirements.raw_text: Expose logs and metrics to external SIEM/monitoring (e.g., syslog, HTTP) with tenant-level segregation.
requirements.normalized_text: Observability export to SIEM/monitoring

requirements.raw_text: Allow promotion prioritization, effective dates, and store/tenant scoping with timezone-aware scheduling.
requirements.normalized_text: Promotion priority, scope, and scheduling

requirements.raw_text: Provide versioned, secured APIs (OAuth2) for tenant-managed catalog, price, tax, and promotion configuration.
requirements.normalized_text: Versioned secured APIs for tenant configuration

requirements.raw_text: Support multi-currency pricing and tender settlement with real-time FX rates from appointed provider.
requirements.normalized_text: Multi-currency pricing and settlement with real-time FX

constraint.description: Apply FX from provider for display and tender settlement

requirements.raw_text: Enable gift card issuance, activation, balance inquiry, top-up, and redemption at POS and SCO.
requirements.normalized_text: Gift card lifecycle operations at POS/SCO

requirements.raw_text: Allow creation and redemption of store credits for returns without original tender.
requirements.normalized_text: Store credit creation and redemption

requirements.raw_text: Support exchange workflows (even/uneven) with automatic tax and price recalculation.
requirements.normalized_text: Exchange workflow with tax/price recalculation

constraint.description: Accurate tax and price handling for exchanges

requirements.raw_text: Fulfill Click & Collect orders by scanning pickup QR/ID and decrementing inventory on completion.
requirements.normalized_text: Click & Collect fulfillment with QR/ID

constraint.description: Streamline pickup and maintain stock accuracy

requirements.raw_text: Allow split tenders (e.g., cash + card + wallet) within a single transaction.
requirements.normalized_text: Split tender payments per transaction

constraint.description: Support multiple tenders in one sale

requirements.raw_text: Support partial authorization and balance completion for prepaid/stored-value instruments.
requirements.normalized_text: Partial authorization and balance completion

requirements.raw_text: Provide gratuity/tip flows (preset percentages, custom input) for eligible tenants.
requirements.normalized_text: Tip/gratuity flows with preset and custom options

requirements.raw_text: Apply surcharge or convenience fees per tender and store policy with clear disclosure on UI and receipt.
requirements.normalized_text: Surcharge/convenience fees per tender with disclosure

requirements.raw_text: Support receipt printing and digital receipt fallback; allow controlled reprints with audit entry.
requirements.normalized_text: Receipt print, digital fallback, and controlled reprint

constraint.description: Ensure customers receive valid proof of purchase

requirements.raw_text: Print labels for shelf/markdowns from POS with barcode formats configured per tenant.
requirements.normalized_text: Label printing for shelf/markdowns

requirements.raw_text: Enforce price overrides with reason codes, approval thresholds, and full audit trail.
requirements.normalized_text: Price override governance with approvals and audit

constraint.description: Reduce fraud and maintain price integrity

requirements.raw_text: Allow suspend/park and later resume of in-progress transactions across devices.
requirements.normalized_text: Suspend and resume transactions across devices

requirements.raw_text: Support basket-level and line-level discounts with exclusion lists and non-stackable flags.
requirements.normalized_text: Basket/line discounts with exclusions and stacking rules

requirements.raw_text: Provide fast product lookup by barcode, PLU, description, and image; cache catalog offline.
requirements.normalized_text: Product lookup with offline catalog cache

requirements.raw_text: Offer training mode where transactions do not post to finance/inventory and are clearly watermarked.
requirements.normalized_text: Training mode without fiscal posting

requirements.raw_text: Control cash drawer open events with reason codes and log each event for audit.
requirements.normalized_text: Cash drawer open control with audit

requirements.raw_text: Generate end-of-shift (Z) reports with totals, variances, and signature capture; export to back office.
requirements.normalized_text: End-of-shift Z report with export

requirements.raw_text: Support tenant hierarchy (group/brand/store) with configuration inheritance and overrides.
requirements.normalized_text: Tenant hierarchy with config inheritance

requirements.raw_text: Ensure strict logical data isolation per tenant with configurable data sharing only via explicit grants.
requirements.normalized_text: Multi-tenant logical data isolation with explicit sharing

requirements.raw_text: Provision POS devices via MDM with kiosk lockdown and automatic certificate enrollment.
requirements.normalized_text: Device provisioning with MDM and kiosk lockdown

requirements.raw_text: Perform remote software updates with staged ring rollout and one-click rollback.
requirements.normalized_text: Remote updates with staged rollout and rollback

requirements.raw_text: Provide store edge node for local failover of POS services with automatic cloud resync.
requirements.normalized_text: Store edge failover with cloud resync

requirements.raw_text: Emit fraud signals (velocity, reversal rates) and forward to SIEM with tenant scoping.
requirements.normalized_text: Fraud signal emission to SIEM

requirements.raw_text: Provide real-time dashboards for sales, refunds, promotions impact with drill-down by store/tenant.
requirements.normalized_text: Real-time sales/refund/promo dashboards

requirements.raw_text: Expose finance export APIs for GL postings and tender settlement summaries (daily).
requirements.normalized_text: Finance export APIs for GL and settlement

constraint.description: Integrate with finance systems for posting

requirements.raw_text: Integrate with ERP (e.g., SAP/Oracle) for items, prices, tax categories via secure APIs.
requirements.normalized_text: ERP integration for catalog/price/tax

constraint.description: Single source of truth for master data

requirements.raw_text: Integrate with inventory systems to fetch stock on hand/ATP and post decrements on sale.
requirements.normalized_text: Inventory integration for SOH/ATP and decrements

requirements.raw_text: Capture customer details with explicit consent and loyalty opt-in; mask PII on screen where possible.
requirements.normalized_text: Customer capture with consent and masked PII

constraint.description: Collect only necessary data per PDPA

requirements.raw_text: Provide handheld queue-busting checkout UI with barcode scanning and mobile payments.
requirements.normalized_text: Queue-busting handheld assisted checkout

requirements.raw_text: Offer SCO attendant console for interventions (age check, overrides, assistance requests).
requirements.normalized_text: SCO attendant console for interventions

requirements.raw_text: Sell kits/bundles (BOM) with automatic component inventory adjustments.
requirements.normalized_text: Kits/bundles sales with component adjustments

requirements.raw_text: Simulate promotions before publishing and validate conflicts/stacking rules in a sandbox.
requirements.normalized_text: Promotion simulation/sandbox and conflict checks

requirements.raw_text: Integrate with Singapore's eTRS for eligible tourist purchases and digital export validation.
requirements.normalized_text: eTRS integration for tourist refunds (SG)

constraint.description: Support IRAS eTRS process where applicable

requirements.raw_text: Apply time-based duty-free eligibility windows relative to flight departure to prevent late purchases.
requirements.normalized_text: Time-based duty-free eligibility windows

constraint.description: Align duty-free with airport timing rules

requirements.raw_text: Encrypt data in transit (TLS 1.2+) and at rest (AES-256) for all POS components.
requirements.normalized_text: Encryption in transit and at rest (TLS 1.2+, AES-256)

constraint.description: Protect data in motion and at rest

requirements.raw_text: Provide disaster recovery with RTO ≤ 4 hours and RPO ≤ 15 minutes, tested semi-annually.
requirements.normalized_text: DR targets RTO≤4h RPO≤15m with testing

requirements.raw_text: Support blue/green and canary deployments with automated rollback on error budget breach.
requirements.normalized_text: Blue/green and canary deployments with rollback

constraint.description: Reduce release risk via gradual rollout

requirements.raw_text: Use feature flags to enable/disable capabilities per tenant/store without redeployments.
requirements.normalized_text: Feature flags per tenant/store

requirements.raw_text: Apply API rate limiting and throttling per tenant to protect shared services.
requirements.normalized_text: API rate limiting per tenant

requirements.raw_text: Ensure idempotency for payment and order APIs using idempotency keys.
requirements.normalized_text: API idempotency for payment/order flows

requirements.raw_text: Expose health/ready/live endpoints and surface status on a central status page.
requirements.normalized_text: Health/readiness/liveness endpoints

requirements.raw_text: Define log retention: 90 days hot storage and 365 days cold storage with secure access.
requirements.normalized_text: Log retention policy (90d hot / 365d cold)

requirements.raw_text: Support data residency in Singapore region for tenant data subject to local regulations.
requirements.normalized_text: Data residency in Singapore region

requirements.raw_text: Encrypt backups and perform quarterly restore tests to validate recoverability.
requirements.normalized_text: Encrypted backups with quarterly restore tests

constraint.description: Ensure backups are secure and restorable

requirements.raw_text: Manage cryptographic keys using KMS/HSM with rotation at least annually.
requirements.normalized_text: KMS/HSM key management with rotation

requirements.raw_text: Code-sign POS binaries; only run trusted, signed images on devices.
requirements.normalized_text: Code-signed binaries enforced on devices

requirements.raw_text: Harden devices: kiosk mode, disable external USB storage, restrict OS settings.
requirements.normalized_text: Device hardening for POS terminals

requirements.raw_text: Support scaling to at least 50 TPS per store across peak hours without degradation.
requirements.normalized_text: Throughput target: ≥50 TPS per store

requirements.raw_text: Maintain P95 API latency ≤ 500 ms for core POS APIs during business hours.
requirements.normalized_text: P95 API latency ≤500 ms for core APIs

requirements.raw_text: Conduct annual WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility audits and remediate critical issues within 90 days.
requirements.normalized_text: Annual WCAG 2.1 AA audits and remediation

requirements.raw_text: Perform independent penetration testing annually and after major releases; remediate criticals within 30 days.
requirements.normalized_text: Annual and post-release penetration testing

requirements.raw_text: Patch management: apply critical security patches within 15 days; high severity within 30 days.
requirements.normalized_text: Vulnerability management SLAs (15/30 days)

requirements.raw_text: Synchronize time via NTP and keep device clock drift within 2 seconds of UTC.
requirements.normalized_text: Time sync via NTP with ≤2s drift

requirements.raw_text: Retain audit logs for at least 24 months with secure, tamper-evident storage.
requirements.normalized_text: Audit log retention ≥24 months

requirements.raw_text: Provide tenant data export (machine-readable) within 30 days of request, with secure delivery.
requirements.normalized_text: Tenant data export within 30 days on request

requirements.raw_text: Support SSO using SAML 2.0 and/or OIDC for admin and back-office consoles.
requirements.normalized_text: SSO via SAML/OIDC for admin consoles

constraint.description: Centralize identity and reduce password risk

requirements.raw_text: Version and audit RBAC policy changes with approver and effective date tracking.
requirements.normalized_text: RBAC policy versioning and change audit

requirements.raw_text: Implement account lockout after 10 failed logins within 10 minutes; unlock after 30 minutes or admin reset.
requirements.normalized_text: Account lockout policy for failed logins

requirements.raw_text: Mask or synthesize PII in non-production environments and restrict access to real data.
requirements.normalized_text: PII masking/synthesis in non-prod

constraint.description: Prevent PII exposure in lower environments
